categories: Category:Battles of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: During the Galactic Civil War, the Alliance to Restore the Republic were forced to evacuate their base on Alis Point. During the evacuation, Alliance pilot Zev Senesca held off three TIE/LN starfighters while an unarmed transport carrying the base personnel fled into hyperspace. Senesca considered the engagement one of his proudest moments.
